name: If I, Then We
description:
This game was created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together".

Things to Consider:

- This was my first game and I have only basic knowledge of the Unity Game Engine.

- The puzzles are easy because I panicked and I didn't have enough time.

- There are no save points (again because of limited time) so exit at your own risk.

- Can be completed in 5-7 minutes.

- It's not my best work so it's not gonna win (<--- Obvious attempt at reverse psychology)

- I had fun making it and I hope you will too. (<---Questionable Optimism)

Enjoy y'all and Thank you for playing this quaint game.
